• Welcome to the BLUE BUTTON, brought to you by Tiz Admin
  • This new, "slimline" version replaces the original, which was wound up at the end of 2025 as it was taking too much time relative to the amount of use it was getting. It requires a little more effort by the user but around 90% less Admin time. But, "Use it or lose it" nevertheless applies. It's a work in progress still, and feedback will be very welcome. Huge thanks to Cookie for encouraging the initial idea, followed by continuous help with evaluation, checking, and constructive criticism.
  • ...
  • ...
  • PLEASE NOTE THAT THE CHAT IS TO BE USED FOR CYCLING AND SOCIAL TALK ONLY, NOT FOR QUERIES/COMPLAINTS REGARDING STREAMS AND OTHER SITE SERVICES. INSTEAD USE THE FAQS AND BLUE BUTTON FOR INFORMATION. 42 If you can't find the info you require, email tiz@tiz-cycling.io or PM @tashatam
  • SUPPORTING THE SITE Tiz is free to everyone everywhere, and is run by unpaid volunteers. It does, however, have running costs (equipment, utilities, etc). The ads on the site are a necessary evil as they earn money. You can also help by donating (Donation button or email Tiz with the header "Donation"), or by buying Tiz a beer (when that option is available - all beer money actually goes on site costs).

  • SECTION 42 - everything you need to know about the Blue Button
  • The schedule is updated daily circa 06.00 UTC.
  • The races listed are scheduled to be broadcast at the times shown on the days shown (but watch for updates), and will usually be recorded and archived as well. All events with English commentary unless otherwise stated.
  • LIVE and RECORDED should be self-explanatory. POSSIBLE LIVE means there is a broadcast but we don't (yet) know if it will be possible to make it available. PROBABLE LIVE means we are pretty sure a broadcast will be available. LIVE Links may also be available embedded on the stream page. Remember Races (from Tiz) and Historic Videos (from Blue Duck) are recorded events offered during the "off season" when there's little live to enjoy
  • If an event isn't listed 2 days before it is due to occur, usually either there's no broadcast OR we didn't know about the race/broadcast. Asking for a "missing" race on the day is too late in most cases, though we will normally see what we can do for "early-bird" requests. We welcome info on "missing" races but NOT on the chat please. Instead PM @Tashatam or email Tiz tiz@tiz-cycling.io
  • If the race you want to watch is scheduled here as LIVE on the stream page, but not shown there in advance, it will appear when the broadcast starts, just refresh the page when the time comes. There often isn't room for advance notice of all of a day's racing on the stream page, which is why we have the Blue Button. Learn to use it or you will miss events !
  • UTC
  • UTC is an international time standard nominally based on longitude 0°, which passes through Greenwich in England and was known historically as the Greenwich Meridian. UTC is roughly the same as GMT (Greenwich Mean Time). The current time at any place in the world can be expressed as the current UTC plus or minus a number of hours dependent on the time zone (mostly defined by longitude). Thus in winter Central European Time (CET) is UTC+1 and Eastern Standard Time (EST) in the USA is UTC-5. Daylight Saving in summer gives us BST (British Summer Time) = UTC +1, CEST (Central European Summer Time) = UTC+2, and EDT (Eastern Daylight Time) = UTC-4. We are now giving race times as UTC as that way everybody can work out the time for their area using the formula for their time zone. This also saves us a huge amount of time.
  • Find your UTC formula using thisTime Zones Map Alternatively use this Time Zone Converter. Unless you move home you need to do it only once ! If you really can't figure it out then ask Admin for help, but it will cost you a beer for Tiz
  • And finally: Chat Admin are not responsible for silly mistakes on the stream page !
